title: Tenement size - For the ongoing buildings, the requirement of tenement size as per this regulation shall be applicable for the balance building potential
clause_text: Tenement size - For the ongoing buildings, the requirement of tenement size as per this regulation shall be applicable for the balance building potential.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.
